name: Event Analyzer Pipeline
description: Reads event data from a subscription, writes to a BigQuery table and sends suspicious activity events to a Pub/Sub topic

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.label: Subscription Id
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub subscription id in the format:

parameters.name: suspiciousActivityTopic
parameters.label: Suspicious activity Pub/Sub topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic id in the format:

parameters.name: datasetName
parameters.label: BigQuery data set to store data
parameters.helpText: Just the bucket name, no gs:// prefix
